Package client

Interface ClientHandler

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
Client, RMIClient, SocketClient
public interface ClientHandler extends Remote

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method

    method called by the server to ask the user to insert the number of players

  • Method Details

    • enterNumberOfPlayers

      void enterNumberOfPlayers() throws IOException
      method called by the server to ask the user to insert the number of players
      Throws:
      IOException

    • updateBoard

      void updateBoard(Tile[][] board, Tile[][] myShelf, Map<String,Tile[][]> otherShelf, int myScore) throws RemoteException
      method called by the server to update the users's board after a turn
      Parameters:
      board - : update board of tiles
      myShelf - : your updated shelf
      otherShelf - : other's shelf
      myScore - : your updated score
      Throws:
      RemoteException - caused by an interruption of the connection

    • theGameEnd

      void theGameEnd(Map<String,Integer> results) throws RemoteException
      method called by the server to notify the end of a game
      Parameters:
      results - : ranking of the participants
      Throws:
      RemoteException - caused by an interruption of the connection

    • startYourTurn

      void startYourTurn() throws RemoteException
      method called by the server to tell the user to start his turn
      Throws:
      RemoteException - caused by an interruption of the connection

    • endYourTurn

      void endYourTurn() throws RemoteException
      method called by the server to tell the user to end his turn
      Throws:
      RemoteException - caused by an interruption of the connection

    • startPlaying

      void startPlaying(int pgcNum, Map<Tile,Integer[]> pgcMap, int cgc1num, int cgc2num, int GameID) throws RemoteException
      function called by the server to tell the user to start playing
      Parameters:
      pgcNum - : personal goal card number
      pgcMap - : map representing the personal goal card tile's disposition
      cgc1num - : first common goal card number
      cgc2num - : second common goal card number
      GameID - : ID of the game you are playing
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • ping

      void ping() throws RemoteException
      method called by the server to ping this client, the client will then call a pong() on the server
      Throws:
      RemoteException - RMI error

    • receiveMessage

      void receiveMessage(String sender, String message) throws RemoteException
      method called by the server to add a message to user's conversation
      Parameters:
      sender - : nickname of the player who sent the message
      message - : text message
      Throws:
      RemoteException - RMI error

    • restoreSession

      void restoreSession(Tile[][] board, Tile[][] myShelf, Map<String,Tile[][]> otherShelf, int myScore, int gameID, int pgcNum, Map<Tile,Integer[]> pgcMap, int cgc1num, int cgc2num) throws RemoteException
      method called by the server to restore the status of a game in a client after a break or a disconnection
      Parameters:
      board - : game board
      myShelf - : user shelf
      otherShelf - : other shelf
      myScore - : user score
      gameID - : game ID
      pgcNum - : personal goal card number
      pgcMap - : map representing the personal goal card tile's disposition
      cgc1num - : first common goal card number
      cgc2num - : second common goal card number
      Throws:
      RemoteException - RMI error
